thread.title: Mistaken identity upsets Paul Hogan’s ex, Noelene | Daily Telegraph
thread.title_full: Mistaken identity upsets Paul Hogan’s ex, Noelene | Daily Telegraph

author: Staff writers
title: Mistaken identity upsets Paul Hogan’s ex, Noelene | Daily Telegraph
text:
WOMAN’S Day might want to get a bit of a tutorial in fake news.
In an epic fail, the long-running magazine printed a news snippet purportedly showing Noelene Hogan (former wife of Paul) with her second husband Reg Stretton. Except it wasn’t.
Noelene Hogan’s husband, Reg, who she married in 2000, has been dead for a number of years.
Instead, the photo showed Hogan with one of her sons.
MORE: How Hoges faired in the ratings war
Despite the fact this is wrong, it's disrespectful. Reg has been dead for many years. This is a photo of my nan out with her son @WomansDay pic.twitter.com/FP2CD9Y6HP
— Mylee Hogan (@MyleeHogan) February 13, 2017 “Despite reports to the contrary, Noelene and her husband Reg Stretton are happier than ever and were spotted shopping for homewares in Sydney recently,” the mag wrote alongside the photo, which showed Hogan with, what turned out to be, her son.
The mag didn’t stop there, though.
MORE: Nikki Osbourne on playing Delvene Delaney in Hoges biopic
media_camera Paul and Noelene Hogan were together for 30 years and have five children. Picture: Patrick Riviere/Getty Images
“The cute pair, who married in 2000, are even planning a special celebration for their 17th wedding anniversary on March 21. ‘Reg’s simple nature and easygoing attitude is perfect for Noelene,” sources say. “He is — and always has been — her rock.’”
Despite a questionable wig and a few timeline errors... that was rather enjoyable. A couple of mates having fun and living the dream #hoges
— Mylee Hogan (@MyleeHogan) February 12, 2017 It took Hogan’s granddaughter, Channel Seven journalist Mylee to point out the unfortunate error in a tweet. “Despite the fact that this is wrong, it’s disrespectful. Reg has been dead for many years. This is a photo of my nan out with her son @WomansDay.”
Ouch.
media_camera Justine Clarke and Josh Lawson star in Hoges: The Paul Hogan Story . Picture: Supplied/Seven.
Mylee Hogan, however was less harsh on the poorly reviewed miniseries Hoges: The Paul Hogan Story, which took a look at her grandfather’s amazing life.
“Despite a questionable wig and a few timeline errors … that was rather enjoyable. A couple of mates having fun and living the dream. #Hoges.”
media_camera Paul and Noelene Hogan with four of their kids. Picture: Supplied Originally published as Hoges’ ex in awful mag mix-up
